attributes.additional_details:
On some issues there are a dozen or more identical petitions.  Or, if not identical they are very similar.  For example,  there are a number of petitions about HS2.
Some of us do not know what HS2  is an abbreviation for.
In  some petitions  the spelling or the grammar is so poor that   it is impossible to understand what the petitioner is asking for.

Please delete  any duplicated petitions  which have inadvertently been posted on this site  in the initial rush  to  make this site dynamic  and a success.
Apologies for my poor grammar.
